detailExplanation.explanation: An intensive weekly deep conditioning treatment that helps nourish and hydrate dry, damaged, or otherwise lackluster hair.
A customizable formula that delivers an optimal blend of nutrients to help give your hair the moisture it needs while also providing an added boost of your selected hair goals.
Formulated with a hair-healthy blend of Japanese sake extract, argan oil, jojoba ester oil, and a custom blend of natural ingredients depending on your hair goals.

detailMoreInfo.title: INGREDIENTS
detailMoreInfo.info: All Function of Beauty products are formulated without sulfates, parabens, phthalates, mineral oils, or gluten, and are always certified vegan and cruelty-free. Our shampoos and conditioners can also be made silicone-free, dye-free, or fragrance-free, based on your preferences. We use more than 60 natural ingredients in our custom formulations to help you achieve your ultimate hair goals.

detailMoreInfo.title: RECOMMENDED USE
detailMoreInfo.info: AApply 1-2 pumps of shampoo to wet hair and massage into a lather. Rinse and repeat (if necessary). Follow with enough conditioner to coat your strands evenly from mid-shaft to ends, leaving it on for 1-2 minutes before rinsing it out thoroughly.

detailMoreInfo.title: GREAT FOR...
detailMoreInfo.info: The Function of Beauty shampoo and conditioner is recommended for all hair types as each product is specially formulated to address your unique hair goals and needs.

detailReview.name: Tracey
detailReview.text: Such wonderful products. For the first time I purchased the leave in treatment which is fabulous.
detailReview.goal: lengthen, deep condition, replenish hair, strengthen, fix split ends
